desc: One stop shop for your custom cakes and French-desserts needs featuring Entremets - the special mousse cakes, and macarons with variety of fillings to choose from. M's Cakes & Bakes cater for local needs in Richmond, Houston, and Sugar Land area around custom cakes, wedding cakes, cookies, and much more.

layout.text: Shiny, bright, and flavorful treat with layers of mousse, sponge, and gourmet chocolate
